## Univariate and Bivariate Stats and Graphics

This workshop will be held on Monday July 23, 2018.

The focus of this workshop is on visualizing variables and computing summary statistics for those variables in your dataset one (univariate) or two (bivariate) at a time. This workshop will introduce both base R graphical approaches and `ggplot2` graphics.

## Data for Workshop

Download the H.E.L.P dataset for this workshop by clicking [here](https://github.com/melindahiggins2000/RWorkshops_EmorySON/blob/master/help.Rdata?raw=true)

You can learn more about the H.E.L.P. _(Health Evaluation and Linkage to Primary Care)_ dataset at [https://nhorton.people.amherst.edu/sasr2/datasets.php](https://nhorton.people.amherst.edu/sasr2/datasets.php)
